title: Your enrollment at University of Technology Nuremberg | UTN

text_sections.section_2: You have been admitted to the program and now want to enroll? Then you’ve come to the right place! Upon successful admission to the degree program and your binding acceptance via UTNexus you can start with the enrollment process OR: you can enroll!
text_sections.section_4: Once you have accepted your study offer on your UTNexus account, your account is open for enrollment. Please use the “Supplement Data” button to upload all documents required for enrollment and download the enrollment application. This application must be signed and submitted by mail with certified copies of your degree certificates.
text_sections.section_7: University of Technology Nuremberg UTN School of StaRs – SDA Dr.-Luise-Herzberg-Straße 4 90461 Nuremberg
text_sections.section_10: The semester fee must be received by UTN before submitting the enrollment application. Once you have accepted your study place, get into contact with Team Student Services ( stars@utn.de (mailto:stars@utn.de) ) to receive your payment details.
text_sections.section_11: The semester fee for the winter semester 2025/26 is . Please make sure to keep proof of your payment.
text_sections.section_13: All students are required to have health insurance (https://www.study-in-germany.de/en/plan-your-studies/requirements/health-insurance/) in Germany. You cannot be enrolled without health insurance.
text_sections.section_14: Applications received before the insurance company has transmitted confirmation of your insurance status will be processed once received. UTN’s official is , in case you need to reference it. You need to apply for this transfer with your health insurance company directly.
text_sections.section_16: Do you have private health insurance? You still need to apply for transfer of your insurance status with a statutory health insurance company of your choice. In order to do so, you need to send your proof of private health insurance to a statutory health insurance company.
text_sections.section_18: Present your EHIC (European Health Insurance Card) or PEB (provisional replacement for EHIC) to a German statutory health insurance. Then the transfer of your insurance status to UTN will proceed.
text_sections.section_19: The statutory health insurances can verify and possibly accept your foreign insurance. In case the insurance can not be accepted, you must also get insured by a German, statutory health insurance company.
